newsitem.title: ITALY: Marzotto to become holding - press report.
newsitem.headline: Marzotto to become holding - press report.

text.p: Italian clothing and textile firm Marzotto Spa, which controls Germany's Hugo Boss, is preparing to become a holding company in order to streamline the group, weekly news magazine Panorama said in an unsourced report. Marzotto had no comment on the report.
Panorama said Marzotto's board was likely to examine the change of status at the beginning of March.
It said the operation involved the creation of two companies to head up the clothing and textile divisions respectively, with Laris, a small Marzotto controlled unit, running the clothing side.
